name: David Coons
bio: David is a Full-Stack Developer with a passion for working with back-end technologies. His experience in Sr. Level management and public speaking has helped inspire some of the features in this application! As a solution oriented thinker he continues to push the boundaries of what is expected of developers so he can "fail forward."

name: Melanie Rogoff
bio: Melanie Rogoff is a Full-Stack Developer with proficiencies in JavaScript, Express, Node, MySQL, React, and Responsive Web Design.

name: Shauna McGrail
bio: Shauna McGrail is a Full-Stack Developer with proficiencies in JavaScript, Responsive Web Design, UX/UI Design, and is passionate about cake.

name: Chris Behrens
bio: Chris Behrens is a Full Stack Web Developer who is a critical thinker, team player and loves a challenge. Proficient with Front-end languages such as HTML, CSS, JavaScript, Bootstrap, and ReactJs. Back-end experience with Node.js, JavaScript, MongoDB and MySQL.
